snippet: Uber is staying put, and by making it illicit, the government has probably relieved the company of the pressure to ensure the safety of its users.
lead_paragraph: Uber is staying put, and by making it illicit, the government has probably relieved the company of the pressure to ensure the safety of its users.

headline.main: Before Accusations, Uber Was a Boon for Indian Women
headline.print_headline: Ban on Uber May Benefit Indian Government
